headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 3X GTA$ and RP on Drop Zone
content: Strap on your 'chute and throw yourself out of a hovering chopper. Whatever you do upon landing is up to you - your goal is to hold the Zone down against your enemy. They'll be dropping in just as fast and just as hot as you. In addition to a set of wind-chapped cheeks, you will walk away with triple GTA$ and RP on Drop Zone, all week long.
